original_text: The clans of the sons of Kohath were to camp on the south side of the tabernacle,
korean_text: 고핫 자손의 종족들은 성막 남쪽에 진을 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: The clans of the sons of Kohath were to camp
sentences.korean_translation: 고핫의 아들들의 족속들은 진을 치어야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: on the south side of the tabernacle
